name: Whiteout (itch) (Amstad Digital)
description:
You are an elf working for Santa.  After working your butt off all year, the sirens howl like every year. 

The work is not done yet.

You get teleported to beyond the front gate like every year.  Unlike every year you stand there alone in the Arctic winter, the eternal night, the dome with the village behind you.

Instructions:
- Trigger: Pickup items, release grenades, fire weapons if held
- Grip: Drop weapon
- Score 300 points to win
